definitions.definition: The overside or up-side of a flat object such as a table , or of a liquid .
The outside hull of a tangible object .

examples: On the surface , the spy looked like a typical businessman.

definitions.definition: The locus of an equation (especially one with exactly two degrees of freedom ) in a space of more than two dimensions .
The story or image suggested by a cryptic clue, when read as a whole sentence without considering wordplay .

main_definition: The overside or up-side of a flat object such as a table , or of a liquid .
secondary_definitions: The outside hull of a tangible object .
( mathematics , geometry ) The locus of an equation (especially one with exactly two degrees of freedom ) in a space of more than two dimensions .
( crosswording ) The story or image suggested by a cryptic clue, when read as a whole sentence without considering wordplay .
